topics.name: Artificial Intelligence Ethics
topics.prompt: Explore the ethical considerations of AI development, focusing on bias, accountability, and regulatory frameworks. Include perspectives from industry leaders, academics, and policy makers. Cite credible sources to corroborate your points.

topics.name: Remote Work Revolution
topics.prompt: Analyze how remote work has transformed the workplace since 2020, covering productivity trends, technology adaptations, and mental health impacts. Include specific examples from major companies. Cite credible sources to corroborate your points.

topics.name: Sustainable Urban Planning
topics.prompt: Investigate innovative approaches to sustainable urban development, focusing on green infrastructure, mixed-use zoning, and public transportation solutions. Include case studies from cities around the world. Cite credible sources to corroborate your points.

topics.name: Future of Digital Privacy
topics.prompt: Examine evolving perspectives on digital privacy, covering consumer rights, business responsibilities, and emerging legislation. Include recent court cases and technology changes. Cite credible sources to corroborate your points.

topics.name: Modern Financial Literacy
topics.prompt: Outline essential financial knowledge for today's economic landscape, including investing basics, debt management, and retirement planning strategies. Focus on practical advice for young adults. Cite credible sources to corroborate your points.
